tool.name: RNA-Seq to EuPathDB
tool.description: Export an RNA-Seq result to EuPathDB
tool.command:
../../bin/exportRnaSeqToEuPathDB "$dataset_name" "$summary" "$description" "$__user_email__" "$__tool_directory__" "$output" "$summary"
#for $key in $bigwig_collection.keys() "$bigwig_collection[$key]" "$key" "$bigwig_collection[$key].metadata.dbkey" bw #end for
#for $key in $fpkm_collection.keys() "$fpkm_collection[$key]" "$key" "$fpkm_collection[$key].metadata.dbkey" txt #end for

param.name: dataset_name
param.label: My Data Set name:
param.help: specify a name for the new dataset

validator.message: Only letters, numbers, spaces and dashes are allowed in the name.
Please restrict the name to 100 characters or less.

param.name: bigwig_collection
param.label: BigWig collection:
param.help: Select the BigWig collection to include in the new EuPathDB My Data Set. The bigwig collection you select here must be mapped to the refreence genome that you select below.

param.name: fpkm_collection
param.label: FPKM collection:
param.help: Select the FPKM collection. Its name should include the phrase 'gene expression'.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does** (check this Tutorial_!)
This tool exports an RNA-Seq result to a EuPathDB site creating a new My Data Set to contain them.
.. _PlasmoDB.org: http://plasmodb.org .. _Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=igQZHjRBqV0
